flawed_nl_solution:
Simon has picked a total of 100 + 200 = <<100+200=3000>>3000 blueberries.
This means he can make 3000 blueberries / 100 blueberries per pie = <<3000/100=30>>30 pies.
#### 30

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 300, not 3000. It appears an extra zero was added to the number.
